title: Honest Review
reviews:
Polite and Professional
Clean and Pleasant
Steak was chewy and tough which was a disappointment as we were in a top restaurant. 
Although it was part of a deal I do feel that part of a staple menu should include potatos of sorts and at...least one veg before charging for extra sides. 
We were offered water still or sparkling which we had to pay for. 
I think I would have rather had sides and water instead of the cocktails which were included in the price .  It cost us a further ¬£48 which was for 2 x fries , 1 x onion rings, upgrade to a rib eye & water. 
Excessive I felt .
Be very careful when booking deals !! Read all the small print and know what you are getting otherwise a budget evening will exceed your carefully worked out budget and put a damper on the evening .‚òπMore

title: Meal Experience

title: Fantastic!
reviews: Amazing service and the food was incredible. We had a 3 course meal, everyone was very attentive and we didn't feel pressured to take our time and enjoy the full experience. Recommend!!

title: Good food nice service
reviews: Food was very good, something for everyone. Service was attentive but not intrusive.would go back again.

title: Excellent!!

title: Great Food

title: Billy

title: Restaurant review

title: Great service
reviews: The food was great as you would expect, but the service was even better.  As an ex-waitress I can be quite critical but the waiting staff were amazing.  Very attentive without being "in your face" Big thumbs up for them.

title: Absolutely Fantastic

The idea that a main course of a pre paid meal can consist of meat alone and that all vegetables are extra is bizarre and reflects badly on mpw we will not go again
Arthur davey

title: Wedding gift
reviews:

Will book again very soon

title: fab

Would definitely recommend.

reviews:

title: Fantastic Steaks and such friendly staff
reviews:

title: Would go again

title: Was a nice venue and place, however, it...

title: Disappointingly average.

title: Dreadful; and take your ear defenders with you

title: Good steak
reviews: Only went in here one evening by accident and was pleasently suprised. the decor is pretty nice and there is a nice crowd. The star of the show is the meat. Nice piece of meat and not to fussy - lighty seasoned and cooked -...More

title: Not what we expected
reviews: Ate at MPW during a 2 day stop over in London before commencing our honeymoon. Was booked as a suprise, but that where the wow factor ended. Over-priced standard steaks. Nothing out of the ordinary. Had far better steaks at a fraction of the price...More

title: Very disappointing
reviews: Found this restaurant very disappointing.  Food was ok, nothing special, same with the service but it was expensive.  I feel that you are just paying for MPW's name, and there are much better restaurants around for less money.  Would not go back here again.  Instead,...More

title: Lovely
reviews: My boyfriend took me here for a late Valentines meal. Food is fab. Quite pricey but worth it. If you enjoy meat that is seasoned wonderfully, cooked perfect and melts in the mouth then this is the place for you. Cosy yet stylish atmosphere, great...More

title: Decent lunch at London Steakhouse
reviews: Used a birthday voucher for 3 course  lunch for two . Very friendly and attentive staff. Well positioned Covid spaced table. Food was nicely presented and tasted good.

title: Disappointing
reviews: It was a very disappointing evening, thought it would be fine dinning but ended up with dishes and wine on the menu were not available. The staff were courteous but we expected more from a ‚Äòreputed‚Äô diner. Ambiance was good. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend it !!!

title: overpriced and average food
reviews: Spent ¬£75 per head for a very average meal.Staff and Service was excellent but food was overpriced. This meal was bordering on terrible..my toffee pud seem mildy warmed in a microwave , my partners apple crumble was cold...meal included one side each with a main...and very average entree..I know it has Marco's name but not worth the money..will never go back.More

title: A lovely gift
reviews: We were gifted a meal at The London Steakhouse and what a wonderful experience it turned out to be. We were served by Yadira, who helped make our visit special, the service was outstanding, the food equally.  We ate off the fixed menu with cocktail...provided and consider this to be very good value for money.  We had the house Merlot with the main course and this to was excellent but a little expensive, but could not use this as a reason not to award five stars as everything else was so good.More

title: Honest Review
reviews:
Polite and Professional
Clean and Pleasant
Steak was chewy and tough which was a disappointment as we were in a top restaurant. 
Although it was part of a deal I do feel that part of a staple menu should include potatos of sorts and at...least one veg before charging for extra sides. 
We were offered water still or sparkling which we had to pay for. 
I think I would have rather had sides and water instead of the cocktails which were included in the price .  It cost us a further ¬£48 which was for 2 x fries , 1 x onion rings, upgrade to a rib eye & water. 
Excessive I felt .
Be very careful when booking deals !! Read all the small print and know what you are getting otherwise a budget evening will exceed your carefully worked out budget and put a damper on the evening .‚òπMore

title: Mr Webb says best steak I had all weekend
reviews: Great place beautifully styled great team and most importantly absolutely top quality food the wife loved the was you reserve the steak on a hot stone cooked to rate and then finish it off to your own taste. Great cut of meats brilliant seasonings and...butters sides where equally as good. My server was Denise at st martins lane she deserves a pay rise üëå.More

title: Date night with hubby
reviews: Food and service was excellent.  The waiter who served our table was very attentive.  All compliments to the chef

title: Virgin experience meal
reviews: Very good value set meal, would do it again. Waitress very helpful offering advice on the menu. Felt very safe with covid protocol .

title: A lovely meal in an atmospheric restaurant!
reviews: The service and food at the London Steakhouse were bpth beyond my expectations! Lovely attentive service, delicious cocktails and an amazing steak - what more could you want! We found the 8oz steak more than enough as part of the three course menu, so don't...feel like you will have to spend a fortune in supplement costs.More

title: They know how to cook steak!
reviews:
Had a gift voucher, and most patrons appeared to also. London was very quiet (no long after Covid lockdown, and many still working from home).

A warm welcome, and good/safe Covid procedures and practices in place.

Good choice of drinks and food, which was delicious....Needed to purchase extra sides to complete meal, but still good value overall.

Would be happy to return, especially for the Beef Wellington.More
